name: Qardio
0:
”Alexa, open Qardio.”
”Alexa, ask Qardio what my latest blood pressure measurement is.”
”What is my latest weight measurement?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: qardio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Qardio has always been about helping you stay on top of your health in the easiest way possible. Our award-winning devices are quick and easy to set up and use, giving you medically accurate data and valuable insights so you can feel in control of your health.
Now we’ve made it even easier with the Qardio skill for Alexa - so you can check your progress and get motivated without having to pick up your phone.

Just ask Alexa for your latest blood pressure or weight measurements and she’ll remind you what they were. 

Here are some examples of what you can do once you open the Qardio skill: 
 - What is my latest blood pressure measurement?
 - How much do I weigh?
 - How is my weight doing this month?
 - What is my average bp this month?

Note: This skill is for information purposes only and should not be used if you're in a life-threatening or emergency medical situation. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health providers with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information provided through this skill by means of Amazon Alexa.
